Name: Baseball Kings VR
About the game: EARLY ACCESS TITLE: Expect glitches, and new content soon! Baseball Kings VR is aimed at realistic Baseball games using virtual reality systems. If you want to enjoy sports through VR, Baseball kings VR will be a choice without regret! By application of physics, you can hit to precise directions make it possible of follow, pulling and bunt. Features Various levels of artificial intelligence Simple UI and easy control to play Various levels of artificial intelligence Variety of bats from standard to funny style Advanced AI divided by 5 difficulty artificial intelligence levels Optimized with combination of real form bat and VIVE tracker Available for Arcades on SpringboardVR
